channel.title: Louis Garrel on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Louis Garrel on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Couture’ Review: Angelina Jolie Explores Her Vulnerability in a Vacuum in Alice Winocour’s Wispy Mood Piece
item.description: Louis Garrel and Vincent Lindon also appear in a drama that considers the interior lives of three women behind the façade of glamorous ateliers and pulsing catwalk shows during Paris Fashion Week.

item.title: ‘Couture’ Review: Angelina Jolie Explores Her Vulnerability in a Vacuum in Alice Winocour’s Wispy Mood Piece
item.description: Louis Garrel and Vincent Lindon also appear in a drama that considers the interior lives of three women behind the façade of glamorous ateliers and pulsing catwalk shows during Paris Fashion Week.

item.title: Angelina Jolie-Starring ‘Couture’ and Franz Kafka Biopic Join San Sebastian Film Festival Lineup
item.description: New feature films from Alice Winocour, Arnaud Desplechin, Kentaro Hirase and Yutaro Seki and Agnieszka Holland are confirmed for the renowned film fest in northern Spain.
